name: Paradise's Shard
customPrimary: Fire light dust that would not move on their own, the light dust will be guided by {%s}, and launch projectile with {%s}{%s} to strike enemies.

name: Blessed Guidance
customPrimary: Fire a guidance beam, it will guide light dust launched by {%s} to attack enemies

name: Magical Pulse Laser Cannon
customPrimary: Copy damage type from other weapons on this ship, whe the weapon is fired, the projectile have a randomly selected {%s} . The more weapon of a damage type exists on this ship, the more likely for that damage type to be selected.

name: Hellfire Shieldcore
customPrimary: Activate to gain {%s} damage reducation and shield damage reducation for 1 second

name: Infernal Shieldcore
customPrimary: Gradually gain {%s} damage reduction and shield damage reduction over 5 seconds. Continued use will overload this weapon and generate {%s} soft flux every second.

name: Diligent Arc Emitter
customPrimary:
Cannot attack. When the ship is not controlled by the player, miruku will partially take over management of the flux system. This will provide {%s} flux dissipition in combat.

On active venting, the weapon will periodically strike enemy within {%s} with EMP arcs causing damage equal to {%s} of current flux and {%s} emp damage.

name: #震荡中继器
customPrimary: 开火时向武器指向处最近的目标施放一道必定会命中的}EMP}电弧。

name: #裂隙射线
customPrimary: 在光束途径之处生成以敌方导弹或战机为目标的时空裂隙。每一处裂隙可对附近造成最多{%s}的能量伤害。

name: #粉碎者
customPrimary: 每一发炮弹都会对装甲造成{%s}的额外伤害，该伤害会在{%s}秒内逐渐生效，且无视装甲减伤。

name: #裂隙洪流发射极
customPrimary: 在命中时产生时空裂隙。在近距离开火命中则会产生更多裂隙。每一处裂隙都会对附近目标造{%s}至{%s}的能量伤害。

name: #不稳定粒子驱动器
customPrimary: 投射物可能失去凝聚力并分散，最多达到{%s}的射程，而最少在达到{%s}的射程便会消失。

name: #现实干扰器
customPrimary: 投射物在前进途中会持续向附近敌方目标放射{EMP}电弧。该武器所造成的伤害均为电弧产生，投射物本身不会造成任何伤害且会直接穿过障碍物。
